tool_description: Identifies and classifies semantic changes in word meanings over time, tracking shifts in connotation, denotation, and usage patterns.

word.description: The word to analyze for semantic changes

time_periods.description: Array of time period labels in chronological order

usage_examples.description: Array of usage examples corresponding to each time period

change_types.description: Types of change to detect: broadening, narrowing, amelioration, pejoration, metaphor, metonymy

error_messages: Insufficient time periods: Provide at least 2 time periods for comparison.
Too many time periods: Limit time_periods to 10 entries maximum.
Mismatched data length: Ensure usage_examples array corresponds to time_periods array.
Invalid change type: Use only [broadening, narrowing, amelioration, pejoration, metaphor, metonymy].
Empty usage examples: Remove any empty strings from usage_examples array.
Chronological order error: Ensure time_periods are listed in chronological sequence.
usage: Provide word, time_periods array, and corresponding usage_examples. Optionally specify change_types to focus on particular semantic shift patterns.

detected_changes.description: Types of semantic changes identified between time periods

semantic_evolution.description: Summary of the word's semantic evolution over time

change_mechanisms.description: Linguistic mechanisms responsible for each change
